page.title: 18 MAUD SCHOOL
page.content: Maud School was built in 1896.It used to have secondary,junior and infant pupils but since 1964 it has been a Primary School with pupils age 5 to 12 There is the Headmistress and 3 other teachers.There are 7 classes with 87 pupils.We have a part time secretary & 5 visiting teachers for gym,music,art remedial and relief.Primary 4,5,6,7 start at 9:00am Primary 1,2,3 start at 9:30am.At 10:40am we can play outside and the games we play are British Bulldog,football,chases,123,rounders, Hide&Seek,the girls skip,play Stick in the Mud or Netball.If you bring 13p you can buy crisps at the Tuck shop. There is a staff room,art room,library office and dining room.Our school dinners come12 miles by bus.Over half the pupils have a school dinner.We go home at 3:00pm or 3:15pm.I like school
